item.title: We Are Young. We Are Strong.
item.description: Rostock in August 1992 year. The situation in the port city, which after the fall of the Berlin wall is not the best of times and suffers from massive unemployment, is heating up with every second. All dissatisfaction with radical residents refer to "home with sunflowers" — giant building, which houses a youth hostel and a camp for Vietnamese seeking asylum in Germany as refugees. The film traces the story of three Heroes: a young Vietnamese Lin, dreaming of a better future, young Stephen, which falls into the company of neo-Nazis, and his father, Martin-local politics-Democrat trying to maneuver between the need to carry responsibility for what is happening and the desire to preserve reputation.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: A Nightingale Falling
item.description: 2014 Irish film set during the Irish War of Independence based on the 2012 novel by PJ Curtis. Directed by Garret Daly and Martina McGlynn, and written by Daly, the film stars Tara Breathnach, Muireann Bird and Gerard McCarthy. The story concerns two sisters who care for a wounded soldier. The film was released in Irish cinemas in September 2014, and received its Irish television premiere on UTV Ireland on Easter Sunday, 5 April 2015.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Chappaquiddick
item.description: Life and political career of Ted Kennedy appear under the threat after road accident of 1969 in which the representative of its headquarters died.

item.title: Paul, Apostle of Christ
item.description: Life story and the death of the apostle Pavel who passed a way from the ruthless persecutor of Christians to one of founders of Christian church. Its last missionary travel comes to an end in prison where it was заточён by order of the Roman emperor Neron. While the captivated Pavel waits for an execution and reflects on the posthumous fate, his follower Luka writes the new Gospel.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: 7 Days in Entebbe
item.description: In 1976 the plane going from Tel Aviv to Paris was seized by terrorists and made emergency landing at the airport of Entebbe in Uganda for the purpose of exchange of hostages for convicted criminals. It was not succeeded to find the diplomatic solution of a question in 7 days. Then very inventive and extremely courageous plan of rescue was developed …
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
item.description: The experiment of the American psychologist is the basis for the movie. He chose volunteers who played a role of supervisors and prisoners, and arranged them in one case the real prison. People quickly accustomed and, to huge surprise of the psychologist, began to behave is unpredictable. What will lead the experiment which got out of hand to?
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Best of Enemies: Buckley vs. Vidal
item.description: The documentary about the legendary televised debates passing in the 1968th year between Gore Vidal and William Frank Buckley Jr.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: All Things Must Pass: The Rise and Fall of Tower Records
item.description: The network of musical shops Tower Records is an example of successful business, the real American dream. The company opened in 1960 in the capital of California – the city of Sacramento, and gradually gained steam. The organization developed and opened branches in 35 countries on all continents of Earth. In these shops came to enjoy the atmosphere, to chat about favourite music and to buy new plates, cartridges and disks. Network shops Tower Records had a considerable impact not only on listeners, but also on musicians. In 1996 turnover of the company made more than one billion dollars. It seemed that it only the beginning of a new era for shop. But unexpectedly for all in 2006 the network went bankrupt. What became the reason? It would be possible to save the company?
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Drunk Stoned Brilliant Dead: The Story of the National Lampoon
item.description: The movie tells story of the American comedy edition National Lampoon from its beginning in the 1970th years and till 2010.
